title: CheckIndex integration
description:
Follow-up of LUCENE-6589.

It would be nice to integrate index consistency checking tools such as CheckIndex into Solr, which verifies checksums and ensures that redundant informations in the index are consistent.

Having some way to run these slow verifications would also allow for integrating LUCENE-6589 which proposes an extension to CheckIndex for block joins.
